00011 // shinymetal.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // ShinyMetal Class Declarations
00015 class ShinyMetal : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         // ShinyMetal Public Methods
00018         ShinyMetal(Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > ks, Reference<Texture<float> > rough,
00019                         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > kr, Reference<Texture<float> > bump) {
00020                 Ks = ks;
00021                 roughness = rough;
00022                 Kr = kr;
00023                 bumpMap = bump;
00024         }
00025         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00026 private:
00027         // ShinyMetal Private Data
00028         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Ks, Kr;
00029         Reference<Texture<float> > roughness;
00030         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap;
00031 };
00032 // ShinyMetal Method Definitions
00033 BSDF *ShinyMetal::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00034         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00035         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00036         if (bumpMap)
00037                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00038         else
00039                 dgs = dgShading;
00040         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00041         Spectrum spec = Ks->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00042         float rough = roughness->Evaluate(dgs);
00043         Spectrum R = Kr->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00044 
00045         MicrofacetDistribution *md = BSDF_ALLOC(Blinn)(1.f / rough);
00046         Spectrum k = 0.;
00047         Fresnel *frMf = BSDF_ALLOC(FresnelConductor)(FresnelApproxEta(spec), k);
00048         Fresnel *frSr = BSDF_ALLOC(FresnelConductor)(FresnelApproxEta(R), k);
00049         bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(Microfacet)(1., frMf, md));
00050         bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(SpecularReflection)(1., frSr));
00051         return bsdf;
00052 }
00053 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00054                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00055         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kr = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Kr", Spectrum(1.f));
00056         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Ks = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Ks", Spectrum(1.f));
00057         Reference<Texture<float> > roughness = mp.GetFloatTexture("roughness", .1f);
00058         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00059         return new ShinyMetal(Ks, roughness, Kr, bumpMap);
00060 }
